name: Keep On Top Of It
description:
For me, one big struggle with game development is balancing it with school. This game is my attempt to capture the feeling of working on a game and schoolwork at the same time.

-Switch between areas of the game by clicking tabs at the top of the screen

-Your grades slowly go down over time if you neglect your work

-Complete homework assignments to raise your grades, although wrong answers could lower them too

-Get your game complete before time runs out!

This was a game made for the first Blackthornprod Game Jam. The theme was "Game Development".

MUSIC: "Basement Floor" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
